description.value: Major Curse You are unable to keep up with the rigors of combat. The moment a combat breaks out, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1}. At the end of each of your turns, your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] condition increases by 1. These conditions end only when you are no longer in combat.
